title: Peas & Spring Cabbage With Pancetta
summary: Peas & Spring Cabbage With Pancetta might be a good recipe to expand your side dish collection. This gluten free, primal, and fodmap friendly recipe serves 6 and costs $1.37 per serving. One serving contains 368 calories, 12g of protein, and 28g of fat. It can be enjoyed any time, but it is especially good for Spring. A mixture of streaky bacon, nutmeg, peas, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. This recipe from BBC Good Food has 1 fans. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 29 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 55%, this dish is solid. Similar recipes include Spring Peas with Pancetta, Creamy Spring Peas With Pancetta, and Spring Salad of Asparagus, Ramps, Snap Peas, and Peas, with Poached Egg and Lemon Zest Vinaigrette.
